dialog: So I usually get a snack before my naps, and like
I was in the mood for a fruit salad.
But I’ll go for a salmon roll instead.
Yawwwwn...
I knew I should’ve brought my headphones.
Thanks!
I'll see you guys around.
Yawwwwn...I'm gonna go take a nap.
It'd be better than waiting around here.
Wow so this is the place boss was talking about
It's a real hoot!
Don't tell any owls I said that....
Usually I crave some lizard meat, but I'm down for some sashimi, please.
Yo, what's going on back there?
It's been a while...
Thanks!
Here's hoping it's better than lizard meat!
Maaaaaaan
I’m hungry enough to go find my own lizards...
I'm out.
So like
My IG followers loved the visual aesthetic of your bowl, so I'm back!
This time, I'll order some sashimi! Pretty please!
Emphasis on pretty.
Can you hurry up please?
I'm losing followers every minute you waste...
Thanks! I can't wait to take a pic before I dig in.
I’m so hungry that I’m giving your truck a half star review.
Okay, so yesterday, you didn’t have any flies...
But... would you happen to have any dragonflies?
No…? How about grasshoppers?
Dang, alright. I’ll have another salmon roll.
Actually, make that two salmon rolls.
Typical of food to try and fly away...
Am I right or am I right?
Hop hop hoorah! Food!
If the food wants to fly, it’s time to hop!
Hello sir! I’m real hungry after baseball tonight!
I even hit a home run!
Can I please have a poke bowl and a salmon roll?
It’s getting late...
I hope my mom doesn’t worry about where I am...
I gotta hurry home now,
but I’ll eat this on the way!
